name: solar-blade
caption: Solar Blade

effect.short: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.
effect.full:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

During []{move:sunny-day}, the charge turn is skipped.

During []{move:hail}, []{move:rain-dance}, or []{move:sandstorm}, power is halved.

This move cannot be selected by []{move:sleep-talk}.
